sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Department” means the Department of Law Enforcement
sections.text: (2)“Missing adult” means a person 18 years of age or older whose temporary or permanent residence is in, or is believed to be in, this state, whose location has not been determined, and who has been reported as
